hero.title: Trade Crypto with Alipay
hero.tagline: A decentralized marketplace where anyone can buy or sell crypto with Alipay. Pure peer-to-peer. Cryptographically secured. No middlemen.

features.title: Trustless. Private.
features.subtitle: Built on cutting-edge cryptography that makes traditional exchanges obsolete

zkProofs.title: Zero-Knowledge Virtual Machines
zkProofs.description: Generate cryptographically verifiable proof for Alipay payment - no personal info exposed on-chain.

instantSettlement.title: Automatic Settlement
instantSettlement.description: Smart contracts execute trades instantly when proofs verify. No manual approval. No delays. Pure automation.

decentralized.title: Peer-to-Peer Marketplace
decentralized.description: Buyers and sellers trade directly. No KYC. No central authority. Your trades cannot be blocked or reversed.

selfCustodial.title: Cryptographic Guarantees
selfCustodial.description: Math enforces fairness. Smart contracts protect both buyers and sellers. Zero-knowledge proofs ensure payment validity.

howItWorks.title: Simple. Elegant.
howItWorks.subtitle: Trade with cryptographic certainty in three steps

step1.title: Create or Fill Orders
step1.description: Sellers: Lock crypto and set your rate. Buyers: Browse orders and choose the best price. The marketplace matches you peer-to-peer.

step2.title: Exchange via Alipay
step2.description: Buyer pays seller directly via Alipay with a unique reference code. Seller's crypto is held securely in smart contract escrow.

step3.title: Automatic Settlement
step3.description: Buyer submits zero-knowledge proof of payment. Smart contract verifies and releases crypto instantly. Both parties protected by math.
